93a4('bum): rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med
93a5('bum): gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor byams pa chen po bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu meng gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang
93a6('bum): mi dmigs so// rab 'byor snying rje chen po bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos
93a7('bum): 'dres pa bco brgyad bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsam gyis mi khyab
93b1('bum): dpag tu meng gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/
93b2('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsam gyis mi khyab dpas su me gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so
93b3('bum): rab 'byor dgra bcom pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor byung chub bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu me ngagagal du
93b4('bum): med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor las kyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi
93b5('bum): dmigs so// rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// gsol pa
93b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du tshor ba bsam
93b7('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'du shes bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du
94a1('bum): ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'du byed bsam gyis mi khyab dpag shes mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang
94a2('bum): mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang minyim pa mi dmigs pa lags
94a3('bum): ci'i slad du mig bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i sla du rna ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis
94a4('bum): gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sna bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
94a5('bum): pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i skad du lte bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du lus bsam
94a6('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du yid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma
94a7('bum): mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyas pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i srad du gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab dpag shum mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyas
94b1('bum): pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du ska bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du dri
94b2('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du ro bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal/
94b3('bum): du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du reg bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang
94b4('bum): mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du chos bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i
94b5('bum): slad du mig gi rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rna ba'i rnam par shes
94b6('bum): pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du sna'i rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab
94b7('bum): dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du lce'i rnam par shes pa ba sam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal
95a1('bum): du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du lus kyi rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma
95a2('bum): mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du yid kyi rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shingame
95a3('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du mig gi 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi
95a4('bum): dmigs pa legs ci'i slad du rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du/
95a5('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du lce'i 'dus te reg pa bsam
95a6('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis ga zhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis
95a7('bum): gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing
95b1('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing yi mnyam pa
95b2('bum): dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
95b3('bum): dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du snga'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags
95b4('bum): ci'i slad du lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du lus kyi
95b5('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du yid ci 'dus te reg pa'i
95b6('bum): rkyer gyis tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sa'i khams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag
95b7('bum): tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du chu'i khams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing
96a1('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du me'i khams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa
96a2('bum): dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du rlung gi khams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa
96a3('bum): lags ci'i slad du nam mkha'i khams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du
96a4('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du ma rig pa bsam gyis
96a5('bum): mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du 'du byed bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du
96a6('bum): ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shingami mnyam
96a7('bum): pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du ming dang gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi
96b1('bum): dmigs pa lagasaci'i slad du skye mched drug bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du sa mchis shingami mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags
96b2('bum): ci'i slang du reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shingami mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lagasaci'i slad du tshor ba bsam gyis mi
96b3('bum): khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shingami mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du sred pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpags su mchis gzhal
96b4('bum): dus mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyas pa mi dmigs pa lagasaci'i slad du len pa bsam kyis mi khyab dpag tum mchis gzhal dum mchis shing
96b5('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du srid pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags
96b6('bum): ci'i slad du skye ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du rga shi bsam gyis mi khyab dpag
96b7('bum): tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal
97a1('bum): du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis
97a2('bum): gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma
97a3('bum): mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag su ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis
97a4('bum): shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing
97a5('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnya
97a6('bum): pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du nang stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi
97a7('bum): dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du phyi stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags
97b1('bum): ci'i slad du phyi nang stong ba nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shingami mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du stong ba
97b2('bum): nyid stong ba nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing spyi mnyas pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lagasaci'i slad du chen po stong pa nyid bas
97b3('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du don dras pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma
97b4('bum): mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'dus byas stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis
97b5('bum): shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'dras ma byas stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang
97b6('bum): mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa
97b7('bum): lags/ ci'i slad du thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dor ba
98a1('bum): med pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis ga zhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du rang bzhin stong
98a2('bum): ba nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu
98a3('bum): ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis
98a4('bum): shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi
98a5('bum): dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags pa ci'i slad du
98a6('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ka ci'i slang du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsam
98a7('bum): mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis
98b1('bum): gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du yang dag par spong ba rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing
98b2('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
98b3('bum): pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du dbang po rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i skad
98b4('bum): du stobs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyas pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsam gyis
98b5('bum): mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu
98b6('bum): ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma
98b7('bum): mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du bsam gtan rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam
99a1('bum): pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du tshad med pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa
99a2('bum): dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang
99a3('bum): mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rnam par thar pa brgyad bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa
99a4('bum): lags ci'i slad du mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis ga zhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa
99a5('bum): lags/ ci'i slad du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa
99a6('bum): dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mngon par shes pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing // mi mnyam dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i
99a7('bum): slad du ting nge 'dzin rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsam gyis mi
99b1('bum): khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bsam kyis mi khyab dpag tu ma
99b2('bum): mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa spyi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mi 'jigs pa bzhi bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal dub mchis shing /
99b3('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi bsam gyis mi bya ba dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
99b4('bum): pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du byams pa chen po bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad
99b5('bum): du snying rje chen po bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
99b6('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma
99b7('bum): mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gsum gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchi
100a1('bum): shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /
100a2('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dgra bcom pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags
100a3('bum): ci'i slad du rang byang chub bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsam gyis
100a4('bum): mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal/
100a5('bum): du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po nyis brgya bcu sum pa//
100a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor gzugs la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor tshor ba la yang bsam pa
100a7('bum): dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'du shes la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab
100b1('bum): 'byor 'du byeng la yang bsam pa dang dpagu pa dang tshang dang mnyas pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rnam par shes pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam ba dang
100b2('bum): mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor mig la yang bsam pa dang dngag pa dang chad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor na ba la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang
100b3('bum): tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor snga la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor lce la yang bsapa
100b4('bum): ba dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor lus la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor
100b5('bum): yid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor gzugs la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs
100b6('bum): so// rab 'byor sgra la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor dri la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//
100b7('bum): rab 'byor ro la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa'i dmigs so// rab 'byor reg la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi
101a1('bum): dmigs so// rab 'byor chos la yang bsas pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor mig gi rnam par
101a2('bum): shes pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa
101a3('bum): dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor sna'i rnam par shes pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor lce'i
101a4('bum): rnam par shes pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor lus kyi rnam par shes pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang
101a5('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor yid kyi rnam par shes pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//
101a6('bum): rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa
101a7('bum): dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor sna'i 'dus te reg pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//
101b1('bum): rab 'byor lce'i 'dus te reg pa la yang bsas pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag
101b2('bum): pa dang chad dang mnyam bdud mi mnyam pa ste dmigs so// rab 'byor yid kyi 'dus te rag pa la yang bsam pa dang dag pa dang tsha dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyas pa mi rigs so//
101b3('bum): rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
101b4('bum): gyis tshor ba la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang
101b5('bum): mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//
101b6('bum): rab 'byor lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
101b7('bum): gyis char ba la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor sa'i khams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi
102a1('bum): mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor chu'i khams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmims so// rab 'byor me'i
102a2('bum): khams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rlung gi khams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa
102a3('bum): mi dmigs so// rab 'byor nam mkha'i khams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i khams la yang bsam
102a4('bum): pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor ma rig pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//
102a5('bum): rab 'byor 'du byed la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rnam par shes pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam
102a6('bum): pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor ming dang gzugs la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor skye mched
102a7('bum): drug la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor reg pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs
102b1('bum): so rab 'byor tshor ba la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyas pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor skyed pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chang dang bcas pa dang /
102b2('bum): mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor len pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor srid pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang
102b3('bum): dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor skye ba la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rga shi la yang bsam pa dang
102b4('bum): dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab
102b5('bum): 'byor tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang bsam pa dang
102b6('bum): dpag pa dang tshad dang mnya pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang bsdus pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//
102b7('bum): rab 'byor bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang bsam pa dang
103a1('bum): dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi dmigs so//
103a2('bum): rab 'byor phyi stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor phyi nang stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa
103a3('bum): dang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor chen po stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa
103a4('bum): dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor don dam pa stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab
103a5('bum): 'byor 'dus byas stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang
103a6('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor
103a7('bum): thog ma tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang
103b1('bum): mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rang bzhin stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor chos thams cad spong ba cing
103b2('bum): la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi
103b3('bum): dmigs so// rab 'byor mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor dngos po med pa spong ba nyid la yang bsapa
103b4('bum): pa dang dpag pa dang chad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab
103b5('bum): 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la yang bsam pa dang
103b6('bum): dpag pa dang tshang dang banyas pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor yang dag par spong ba rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang rgyang dang mnyam pa dang la la pa mi dmigs so// rab
103b7('bum): 'byor rdzu 'phrul gyi gang pa rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor dbang po rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang
104a1('bum): dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor stobs rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab
104a2('bum): 'byor byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yang bsam pa dang
104a3('bum): dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab
104a4('bum): 'byor bsam gtan rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor tshad med pa rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang /
104a5('bum): mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor
104a6('bum): rnam par thar pa rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yang bsam
104a7('bum): pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong ba nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / sngon po med pa la yang bsam pa
104b1('bum): dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang pi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor mngon par shes pa rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs
104b2('bum): so// rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor gzungs kyi sgo rnams la yang bsam pa dang
104b3('bum): dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs
104b4('bum): so// rab 'byor mi 'jigs pa rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la yang bsam pa dang
104b5('bum): dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor byams pa chen po la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor
104b6('bum): snying rje chen po la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang
104b7('bum): mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor lan cig phyir 'ong
105a1('bum): ba'i 'bras bu la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa
105a2('bum): dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor dgra bcom pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rang byang chub
105a3('bum): la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa
105a4('bum): mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// gsol pa bcom ldan
105a5('bum): 'das ci'i slad du gzugs la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi
105a6('bum): mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du 'du shes la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du 'du byed la bsam pa dang dpag
105a7('bum): pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i
105b1('bum): slad du mig la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rna ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs
105b2('bum): ba lags/ ci'i slad du sA la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lce la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi
105b3('bum): mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lus la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slang du yid la bsam bu dang dpag pa dang
105b4('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du gzugs la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sgra la bsam
105b5('bum): pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags// ci'i slad du dri la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ co'i slad du
105b6('bum): ro la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du reg la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i
105b7('bum): slad du chos la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mig gi rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam
106a1('bum): pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad
106a2('bum): du sna'i rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du lce'i rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang
106a3('bum): mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du lus kyi rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du
106a4('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du mig gi 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa
106a5('bum): dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du snga'i 'dus te reg
106a6('bum): pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du lde'i 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa
106a7('bum): lags/ ci'i slad du lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la ba sam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang
106b1('bum): banyas pa dang mi mnyas pa mi dmigs pa lags pa ci'i mang du mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dbag pa dang chad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags
106b2('bum): slang ngu ra ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang
106b3('bum): dpag pa dang tsha dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lde'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyas pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa
106b4('bum): lags/ ci'i slad du lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
106b5('bum): tshar bal bsam pa dang pag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ tsi'i slang du sa'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi rigs pa lags
106b6('bum): ci'i slad du chu'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du me'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi
106b7('bum): dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du rlung gi khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du nam mkha'i khams la bsam pa dang
107a1('bum): dpag pa drang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rnam par shes pa'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa
107a2('bum): mi dmigs pa lags pa ci'i slad du ma rig pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du 'du byed la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang
107a3('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lagasaci'i slad
107a4('bum): du ming dang gzugs la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du skye mched drug la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang
107a5('bum): mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag
107a6('bum): ba dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du sred pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du
107a7('bum): len pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du srid pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa
107b1('bum): lags 'i srang du skye ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyas pa dang mi mnyes pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slang du ma shi la bsam pa dang bag pa dang cang dang sa nyas pa dang
107b2('bum): mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i srang du tshul khrims kyi
107b3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la bsum pa dang dpag pa dang tshung dang mnyas pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chad dang mnyam pa
107b4('bum): dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du
107b5('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa yi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang ched
107b6('bum): dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du nang song ba nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du phyi stong pa
107b7('bum): nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du phyi nang stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs
108a1('bum): pa lags ci'i slad du stong pa nyid spong ba nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du chen po stong ba nyid
108a2('bum): la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du don dam pa spong ba nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs
108a3('bum): pa lags ci'i slad du 'dus byas stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du 'dus ma byas stong ba nyid la bsam pa dang
108a4('bum): dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags
108a5('bum): ci'i mang du thog pa dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i mang du dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang
108a6('bum): tshang dang mnyal pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slang du rang bzhir song ba nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang rma dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lagasaci'i srang
108a7('bum): du chos thams cad stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slang du rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang
108b1('bum): tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slang du mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chang dang mnyam pa dang mi makram pa mi dmigs pa lags
108b2('bum): ci'i slad du dngos po med pa song ba nyid pa bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i srang du ngo ba nyid song ba nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang
108b3('bum): rang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid spong ba nyid la bsas pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags
108b4('bum): ci'i slad du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du yang dag par spong ba rnams la blasam pa dang dpag pa dang
108b5('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags
108b6('bum): ci'i slad du dbang po rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du stobs rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang
108b7('bum): mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du 'phags pa'i
109a1('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag
109a2('bum): pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyem pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du bsam gtan rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam padang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du tshad med pa
109a3('bum): rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang
109a4('bum): mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
109a5('bum): par 'jug pa dgu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa ljags ci'i slad du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la
109a6('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du mngon par shes pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi
109a7('bum): dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du ting nge 'dzin rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du gzungs kyi sgo rnams la bsam pa
109b1('bum): rang dpag pa dang tshad dang phranyas pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa ma
109b2('bum): dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du mi 'jigs pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad drung menyas pa dang mi gnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slang dus so yang dag par rig pa rnams la
109b3('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du byams pa chen po la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa
109b4('bum): lags/ ci'i slad du snying rje chen po la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgya la bsam pa dang dpag
109b5('bum): pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du chun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags
109b6('bum): ci'i slad du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang
109b7('bum): mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du dgra bcom pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du rang byang chub la
110a1('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa
110a2('bum): dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags
110a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med ga zhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir gzugs la bsam pa dang
110a4('bum): dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpog tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste de'i phyir tshor
110a5('bum): ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'du shes kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med ga zhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
110a6('bum): ste/ de'i phyir 'du shes la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'du byed kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la
110a7('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste de'i phyir 'du byed la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam
110b1('bum): kyis mi khyab dngag tu mang gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// 'ang /
110b2('bum): 'byor mog gi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mig la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi
110b3('bum): dmigs so// rab 'byor rna ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir napa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa
110b4('bum): dang mi mnyam pa myi dmigs so// rab 'byor sna'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag sa med ga zhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa 'o// de'i phyir sA la bsdus pa dang dpag pa dang tshang
110b5('bum): dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor lce'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lce la bsam pa dang
110b6('bum): dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor lus kyi ngo bo nyid bsam kyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir
110b7('bum): lus la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor yid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
111a1('bum): ste/ de'i phyir yid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med
111a2('bum): gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste de'i phyir gzugs la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor sgra'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag
111a3('bum): tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste ka de'i phyir sgra la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor dri'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi
111a4('bum): khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir dri la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor ro'i ngo bo nyid
111a5('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i ro la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor reg
111a6('bum): gi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med ga zhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir reg la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//
111a7('bum): rab 'byor chos kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med ga zhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir chos la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi
111b1('bum): dmigs so// rab 'byor mig gi rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa sa/ de'i phyir mig gi rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang
111b2('bum): dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor na ba'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa sgo/
111b3('bum): de'i phyir rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor sna'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal
111b4('bum): du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sna'i rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor lho'i rngas par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid
111b5('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lce'i rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi dmigs so// rab 'byor/
111b6('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du mngal mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lus kyi rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang
111b7('bum): mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir yid kyi
112a1('bum): rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med
112a2('bum): gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mig gi 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid
112a3('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//
112a4('bum): rab 'byor sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med ga zhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sna'i 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa
112a5('bum): dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lce'i 'dus te reg pa la bsam/
112a6('bum): pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/
112a7('bum): de'i phyir lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med
112b1('bum): gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te
112b2('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du me dral mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa skye de'i phyir mig gi 'dus kyi reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsho rab la bsam pa dang dpag
112b3('bum): pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa
112b4('bum): dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor snga'i 'dus te reg pa
112b5('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa
112b6('bum): dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam
112b7('bum): pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor lus kyi 'dus
113a1('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu meng gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
113a2('bum): gyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med
113a3('bum): gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor
113a4('bum): sa'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sa'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi
113a5('bum): dmigs so// rab 'byor chu'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir chu'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang
113a6('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor me'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu mer gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir me'i khams la
113a7('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rlung gi khams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
113b1('bum): ba ste/ do'i phyir rlung gi khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor nas pakha li khams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu bang
113b2('bum): gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir nam mkha'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i
113b3('bum): khams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshangad dang mnyam pa dang
113b4('bum): mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor ma rig pa'i ngo bo nyid bsas kyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir ma rig pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa
113b5('bum): dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'du byed kyi ngo bo nyid bsapa gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir 'du byed la bsam
113b6('bum): ba dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med ga zhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/
113b7('bum): de'i phyir rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor ming dang gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med/
114a1('bum): la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir ming dang gzugs la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor skye mched drug
114a2('bum): gi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir skye mched drug la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//
114a3('bum): rab 'byor reg pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu bdag zhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang pi mkham pa mi
114a4('bum): dmigs so// rab 'byor tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa
114a5('bum): dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor sred pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sred pa la bsam pa dang
114a6('bum): dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor len pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med ga zhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang banyam pa ste
114a7('bum): de'i phyir len pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor srid pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam
114b1('bum): ba dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sring pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor skye ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu pang
114b2('bum): gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir skye ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rga shi'i ngo bo tshang bsam gyis
114b3('bum): mi khyab dpag tu med ga zhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rga shi la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang panyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor
114b4('bum): sbyor ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu meng gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang
114b5('bum): dang mnyal pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste
114b6('bum): de'i phyir tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi
114b7('bum): khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//
115a1('bum): rab 'byor brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi
115a2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med
115a3('bum): gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor shes
115a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med ga zhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang
115a5('bum): mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir nang stong pa nyid la
115a6('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor phyi stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/
115a7('bum): de'i phyir phyi stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med ga zhal du med la mi
115b1('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyal ba se/ de'i phyir phyi nang stong ba nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyas pa dang pi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor stong ba nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi
115b2('bum): khyab dpag tu mang gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa se/ de'i phyir song ba nyid stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang pi mnyas pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor che po skyong ba
115b3('bum): nyi kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu meng gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir chen po stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//
115b4('bum): rab 'byor don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir don dam pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang
115b5('bum): mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam kyis mi khyab dpag tu meng gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyas paste/ de'i phyir 'dus byas
115b6('bum): stong ba nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam
115b7('bum): ba dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir 'dus sa byas stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi
116a1('bum): ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa skye de'i phyir mtha' las 'das pa stong ba nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam
116a2('bum): ba dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir thog ma dang
116a3('bum): tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khya ba dpag tu med gzhal du med
116a4('bum): la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste de'i phyir dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rang bzhir stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid
116a5('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med ga zhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//
116a6('bum): rab 'byor chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa skye/ de'i phyir chos thams cad stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa/
116a7('bum): dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/
116b1('bum): de'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid stong ba nyid la bsam pa dang dadag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor mi dmigs pa stong ba nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab
116b2('bum): dngag tu me gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste de'i phyir mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang dreng dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab
116b3('bum): 'byor dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu me dag zhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang
116b4('bum): dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'phyir ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo ba nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag kyi med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa sa
116b5('bum): de'i dri ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyas pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dadag
116b6('bum): tu bang gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir dngos po sred pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs
116b7('bum): so/ rab 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa sa de'i phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag
117a1('bum): ba rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab
117a2('bum): dpag tu med gzhal du meng la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir yang dag par spong ba rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab
117a3('bum): 'byor rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag
117a4('bum): ba dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor dbang po rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i
117a5('bum): phyir dbang po rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor stobs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsal gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi
117a6('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir stobs rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ngo bo
117a7('bum): nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste de'i phyir byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa
117b1('bum): mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo ba nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir 'phags pa'i
117b2('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu
117b3('bum): med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor
117b4('bum): bsam gtan rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyas pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir bsam gtan rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam
117b5('bum): ba dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor tshad med pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang panyam pa ste/ de'i phyir tshad med pa rnams la
117b6('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang sanyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med
117b7('bum): la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rnam
118a1('bum): par thar pa brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang
118a2('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang /
118a3('bum): mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rnam par thar pa'i sgo
118a4('bum): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
118a5('bum): dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam kyis mi khyab
118a6('bum): dpag su me gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mngon par shes pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor
118a7('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa su/ de'i phyir ting nge 'dzin rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang
118b1('bum): mi mags pa mi migs so// rab 'byor gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi bcid bsam kyis mi khyab dpag su med gzhal du mengs mi mnyas pa dang mnyas pas de'i phyir gsungs sa rnams pa
118b2('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i ngo ba nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du mdu la mi mnyam pa
118b3('bum): dang mnyam pa ste de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid bsam
118b4('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu me ga zhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mi 'jigs pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor
118b5('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa
118b6('bum): dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa pi dmigs so// rab 'byor byams pa chen po'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i
118b7('bum): phyir byams pa chen po la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor snying rje chen po'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med ga zhal du med la
119a1('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir snying rje chen po la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos
119a2('bum): 5/ 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khya ba dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bsam pa dang dpag pa
119a3('bum): dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
119a4('bum): skye de'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid bsam
119a5('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste de'i phyir lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi
119a6('bum): dmigs so// rab 'byor phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la
119a7('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor dgra bcom pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhol du med la mi mnyam
119b1('bum): bdud stsal bste de'i phyir dag pacom pa cid la bsam pa dang ngag pa dang rmang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rang byang chub kyirdzob nyid bas pa
119b2('bum): kyis mi za ba dpag tu me gzhal du mdu la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rang byang chub la bsas pa dang dpag pa dang dung dang mnyas pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//
119b3('bum): rab 'byor lal gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du mngal mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa sa/ de'i phyir lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nying la bsam pa dang dpag
119b4('bum): ba rang nga dang mnyas pa dang mi mnyas pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid kyang banyid bams kyis mi khyab dpag su se gzhal du med la sa mnyas pa dang sa nyas pa
119b5('bum): de'i phyir dam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyas pa mi dmigs so/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
119b6('bum): song phrag rgyab bal po nyis 'drubag pa/ rab 'byor de snyam dumams/ gzugs gang bsam gyis mi bya ba dpag su me gzhas du ma sa
119b7('bum): bdang tham pa dag gzun pa dmigs su yongs tshor ba ga bams rgyas mi rtsi ba dpag kyime gzhas du ba sa mi mnyam pa dang ma pa la pa ba rigs su yongs
120a1('bum): 'du shes gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la 'du shes dmigs su yod dam/ 'du byed gang bsam gyis
120a2('bum): mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa se/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la 'du byed dmigs su yod dam/ rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/
120a3('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rnam par shes pa dmigs su yod dam/ mig gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu meng gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la mig dmigs su yod
120a4('bum): dam/ rna ba gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rna ba dmigs su yod dam/ rna gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/
120a5('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sna dmigs su yod dam/ lce gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu meng gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lce dmigs su yod dam/ lus
120a6('bum): gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lus dmig su yod dam/ yid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa su mi mnyam
120a7('bum): pa dang mnyam pa de la yid dmigs su yod dam/ gzugs gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la gzugs dmigs su yod dam/
120b1('bum): sgra gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sgra dmigs su yod dam/ dri gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa su
120b2('bum): mi mnyam pa dang bcas pa de la dri dmigs su yod dam/ ro gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa sa/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la ro dmigs su yod dam
120b3('bum): reg gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa se mi mnyam pa dang mnyas pa de la reg dmigs su yod dam/ chos gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med
120b4('bum): gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la chos dmigs su yod dam/ mig gi rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang
120b5('bum): mnyam pa de la mig gi rnam par shes pa dmigs su yod dam/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la
120b6('bum): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dmigs su yod dam/ sna'i rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pas/ mi marnam pa dang mnyam pa de la snga'i rnam par shes pa dmigs su
120b7('bum): yod dam/ lce'i rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lce'i rnam par shes pa dmigs su yod dam/ lus kyi rnam
121a1('bum): par shes pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa dmigs su yod dam yid
121a2('bum): kyi rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyas pa dang mnyam pa de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa dmigs su yod dam mig gi 'dus te reg pa gang
121a3('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa dmigs su yod dam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu
121a4('bum): med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dmigs su yod dam/ snga'i 'dus te reg pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste
121a5('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa dmigs su yod dam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa gang bsal gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la
121a6('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa dmigs su yod dam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa
121a7('bum): dmigs su yod dam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dmigs su yod dam/
121b1('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rgyur gyi tshor ba byasas kyis mi khyab dpag tu med gagal du med pa sa/ mi mnyas pa dang mnyam pa de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor rab dmigs su yod dab
121b2('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor rab dmigs su
121b3('bum): yod dam/ snga'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
121b4('bum): tshor ba dmigs su yod dam lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lce'i 'dus te
121b5('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmigs su yod dam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu meng gzhal du meng pa sku/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
121b6('bum): de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmigs su yod dam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu meng gzhal du med pa ste/
121b7('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmigs su yod dam/ sa'i khams gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa
122a1('bum): dang mnyam pa de la sa'i khams dmigs su yod dam chu'i khams gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
122a2('bum): pa de la chu'i khams dmigs su yod dam/ me'i khams gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med ga zhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la me'i khams dmigs su yod dam
122a3('bum): rlung gi khams gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rlung gi khams dmigs su yod dam/ nam mkha'i khams gang bsam gyis mi
122a4('bum): khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la nam mkha'i khams dmigs su yod dam rnam par shes pa'i khams gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal
122a5('bum): du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rnam par shes pa'i khams dmigs su yod dam/ ma rig pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
122a6('bum): pa de la ma rig pa dmigs su yod dam/ 'du byed gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la 'du byed dmigs su yod dam/ rnam par shes
122a7('bum): ba gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rnam par shes pa dmigs su yod dam/ ming dang gzugs gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag
122b1('bum): ku med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la ming dang gzugs dmigs su yod dam/ skye mched drug gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa sa/
122b2('bum): mnyam pa dang banyam pa de la ske mched drug dmigs su yod dam/ rig pa gang bsam kyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pas/ mi mnyas pa dang mnyam pa de la reg pa dmigs sa
122b3('bum): yod dang / tshor ba gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du sred pa ste/ mi sanyam pa dang mnyam pa de la tshor ba dmigs su yod dam/ sred pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu
122b4('bum): med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sred pa dmigs su yod dam/ len pa gang bsapa gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la len pa
