298a3('bum): nub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go nA de ni
298a4('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni rang
298a5('bum): gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
298a6('bum): rab 'byor mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub
298a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub
298b1('bum): sems dpa'i bo cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir po che de ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po'i blo ni de ni ngo bo nyid
298b2('bum): pa nyid dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ ra ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rnga ba nyid stong pa nyid kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i po cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir gon+ya de rnying po nyid stong pa nyid
298b3('bum): 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go chang ni dngos po meng ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang 'brel ba ma yin to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor ma
298b4('bum): ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o//
298b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgyab bam po nyis brgya nyer bzhi pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ga tsho de ni dran pa
298b6('bum): bar gzhag pa dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhab pa rnams kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni dran pa nye bar
298b7('bum): gzhag pa dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni yang dag par spong ba dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor yang dag
299a1('bum): par spong ba rnams kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni yang dag par spong ba dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor
299a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub
299a3('bum): sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni dbang po dang 'brel ba ma
299a4('bum): yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dbang po rnams kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni dbang po dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor bya
299a5('bum): nub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go ched ni stobs dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor stobs rnams kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go tshe yang med pas
299a6('bum): de'i phyir go na de ni stobs dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni byang chub kyi yan lag dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe nas rab 'byor
299a7('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go ma de ni byang chub kyi yan lag dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems
299b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnams kyang shin tu med la/ bya
299b2('bum): nub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir bo na de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brkyang ba dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bo na de ni 'phab so
299b3('bum): ba'i bden pa dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'phabs pa'i bden pa rnams kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go chu yang med pas/ de'i phyir go ma de ni 'phags pa'i
299b4('bum): bden pa dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni bsam gtan dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor bsam gtan rnams
299b5('bum): kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni bsam gtan dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha
299b6('bum): de ni tshad med pa dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor tshad med pa rnams kyang shin tu meda'/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni tshad med pa
299b7('bum): 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang / sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs
300a1('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir po cha de ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang 'brel
300a2('bum): ba ma yin zhes bya'o// sa tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni rnam par thar pa brgyad dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang shin tu
300a3('bum): med la/ byang chub sems dpa' go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni rnam par thur pa brgyad dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa mnang
300a4('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyems par 'jug pa dgu yang shin tu med la/ byang chub
300a5('bum): sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang 'brel ba na yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
300a6('bum): po'i bo che ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / sman pa med pa dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
300a7('bum): ma med pa dang / smon med pa yang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang sman pa med
300b1('bum): ba dang 'bre ba ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha de ni mngon par shes pa dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mngon par
300b2('bum): shes pa rnams kyang shin tu med la// byang chub sems dpe'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir po cha de ni mngon par shes pa dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub senas dpa' sem
300b3('bum): dnga' chen po'i go mdo ni ting nge 'dzin dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang meng bas/ de'i phyir po ched
300b4('bum): niting nge 'dzin dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po'i go cha de ni gzungs kyi sgo dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor bgrangs kyi
300b5('bum): sgo rnams kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni gzungs kyi sgo dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
300b6('bum): po'i go chad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang
300b7('bum): med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go che de ni mi 'jigs pa dang 'brel ba
301a1('bum): ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni mi 'jigs pa dang
301a2('bum): 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni so so yang dag par rig pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor so so yang
301a3('bum): dag par rig pa rnams kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni so so yang dag par rig pa dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang
301a4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni byams pa chen po dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor byams pa chen po yang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i gom
301a5('bum): med pas de'i phyir go cha ni byams pa chen po dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni snying rje chen po dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir
301a6('bum): zhe na/ rab 'byor snying rje chen po yang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni snying rje chen po dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems
301a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go chad de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang shin tu med la
301b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i po cha yang med pas ka de'i phyir go cha de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por
301b2('bum): sonanani rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir de na/ rab 'byor rgyur du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang shin tu med la ga byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas ngom
301b3('bum): b+h+yo po chad ni sbyin du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ro go med ni len cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'brel pa
301b4('bum): ma yin te/ de ci'i byor zhe na/ rab 'byor lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang shin tu mang la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas// de'i phyir ge cha de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
301b5('bum): 'bras bu dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab
301b6('bum): 'byor phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o// rab
301b7('bum): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni dgra bcom pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dgra bcom pa nyid kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems
302a1('bum): dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go che de ni dgra bcom pa nyid dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
302a2('bum): go cha de ni rang byang chub dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rang byang chub kyang shin tu med la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni rang byang
302a3('bum): chub dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni kham gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor
302a4('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni lam gyo rnam pa shes pa nyid dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o// rab
302a5('bum): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang 'brel ba ma yin te de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
302a6('bum): kyang shin tu med la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub
302a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa gang dag gis sems can thams cad bdag cag gis yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes
302b1('bum): go cha bgos pa de dag gi go chani chos thams cad dang 'brel ba ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad yongs su/
302b2('bum): mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes go cha 'tshal ba des nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i gnas gnyis su dogs par mi bgyi ste// bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad yongs
302b3('bum): su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes go cha 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ba'i gnas dang skabs ma mchis te/
302b4('bum): de na gnas ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sa mtshams bcad de/ sems can gyi rin du go cha 'tshal ba ma lags so//
302b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor khyod kyis don gyi dbang gang zhig mthong na/ de skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar go cha bgos shing
302b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa des nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i gnas gnyis su dogs par mi bya'o zhes smras gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
302b7('bum): de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems can nyi tshe nyung zad cig gi slad du go ma 'tshal ba ma lags/ ye shes cung zad nyi tshe zhig gi slad du go cha 'tshal ba ma lags te/
303a1('bum): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i slad du go cha
303a2('bum): 'tshal to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi slad du go cha 'tshal to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
303a3('bum): rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i don du go cha bgos pa ma yin/ ye shes cung za
303a4('bum): tshe'i don du go cha bgos pa ma yin gyi/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba dang / thams cad
303a5('bum): mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi don du chu bgos so// gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni shin tu zab pa ste/ de ni sras kyang bsgom par mi
303a6('bum): bgyi ci yang bsgom par mi bgyi gang du yang bsgom par mi bgyi'o// de ci'i srad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la gang bsgom pa
303a7('bum): 'am/ gang bsgom par bgyi ba 'am/ gang gis bsgom par bgyi ba'i chos gang yang yongs su grub pa dmigs su ma mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ste ste/ shes rab kyi pha
303b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni nam mkha' bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bcom pa de ni chos thams cad bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan
303b2('bum): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni ma mchis pa bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'od lha ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsdom pa deni yongs su
303b3('bum): 'dzin pa ma mchis pa bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis
303b4('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni gang bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa yin/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab
303b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di mi tshor
303b6('bum): ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'du shes bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//
303b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'du byer bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab
304a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
304a2('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni/ rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mig bsgom pa rnam par
304a3('bum): bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rna ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes
304a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sna bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lce bsgom
304a5('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lus bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
304a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ yid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ gzugs
304a7('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni// sgra bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di/
304b1('bum): ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ dri bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni
304b2('bum): ro bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ reg bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'a
304b3('bum): sde/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'don/ chos bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mis
304b4('bum): gi rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bsgom
304b5('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ snga'i rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom
304b6('bum): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lce'i rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
304b7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
305a1('bum): pa 'di ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/
305a2('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par
305a3('bum): bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ snga'i 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta
305a4('bum): ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
305a5('bum): pa 'di ni/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bsgom
305a6('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
305a7('bum): pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom
305b1('bum): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'dul
305b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher rab bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rom
305b3('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'od ni/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
305b4('bum): pa 'dzi na/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sa'i
305b5('bum): khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ chu'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan
305b6('bum): 'dus 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ me'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
305b7('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni/ rlung gi khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ nam mkha'i khams bsgom pa
306a1('bum): rnam par bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam par shes pa
306a2('bum): khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ ma rig pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//
306a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'du byed bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
306a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ ming dang /
306a5('bum): gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ skye mched drug bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//
306a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha ro//
306a7('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sred pa bsgom
306b1('bum): pa rnam par bsgob pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bcom pa 'di ni/ len pa 'gom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das nga/
306b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bcom pa 'dzin/ sring pa bcom pa rnam par bcom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'dil te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bcom pa
306b3('bum): ni/ skye ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'od na/ rga shi bsgom pa rnam par bsgob pa'o//
306b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lnga ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ bdag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'odi la ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
306b5('bum): byin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sems can bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ srog bathom pa rnam
306b6('bum): par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'gro ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lnga rtse shes
306b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni gso ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ skyes bu/
307a1('bum): bzhom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di wA D+h+we/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgob pa 'di ni/ gang zag bathob pa rnam par bzod
307a2('bum): ba'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bcom pa 'di ni shed car bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes ra
307a3('bum): kyis pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni shed bdag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lnga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir pa bzom pa 'di ni byed pa po
307a4('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di la me/ shes ra kyi rol byon pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ tshor ba po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das nga
307a5('bum): She/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni shes pa po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu byon pa bsgom
307a6('bum): pa 'di na/ mthong ba po bcom pa rnam par bcom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di sa hUM/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bcom dzin sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom parnam
307a7('bum): par bzhom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di sa te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan
307b1('bum): 'das 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bcom pa 'don bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di shes rab tu
307b2('bum): pa rol tu phyin pa 'thol pa 'di na/ btson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'dis te shes rab kyi pha rob tu phyin pa bcom pa
307b3('bum): 'di ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di sa te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bathom pa 'di ni/ shes rab kyi
307b4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lnga ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par
307b5('bum): bcom pa'i/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lnga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di na byi stong pa nyid bathob pa rnam par 'thos pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'a
307b6('bum): ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ phyi nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'dus 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
307b7('bum): rtsor pa bsgom pa 'di mi stong pa nyid song ba nyid bcom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'ong la ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni chen po nyid
308a1('bum): pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid
308a2('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lnga ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//
308a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes
308a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
308a5('bum): pa 'di ni/ thob ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di sa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni ga dor
308a6('bum): ba med pa spyod pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par
308a7('bum): bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan
308b1('bum): 'das 'di sa tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rang gi mtshan nyi thong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di la ste shes pa
308b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brjob pa 'dri ni/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bathom pa rnam par bskyob pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di la te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bcom pa 'di ni
308b3('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bcom pa 'di ni/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par
308b4('bum): bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgob pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//
308b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ dran pa nye bar gnag pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste
308b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'dir yang dag par thong ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta hUM shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'ang
308b7('bum): ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ dbang po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
309a1('bum): pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni stobs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan
309a2('bum): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab
309a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu byon
309a4('bum): pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni bsam
309a5('bum): gtan bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ tshar med pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//
309a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ gzugs med pa'i stobs par 'jug pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan
309a7('bum): 'das 'di la ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes
309b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu sbyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mthar gyis gnas par stobs par 'jug par dgu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi bcom
309b2('bum): tu phyir ba bsgom pa 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa'i tho stong pa nyid dang / mtshar pa med pa dang / smyon pa med pa bsgom pa rnam par bcom pa'o// som ldan 'das 'di lta ste
309b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni mngon par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bcom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta steshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
309b4('bum): bathob pa 'don ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di na/ gzungs
309b5('bum): sgob bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bsgom pa rnam par
309b6('bum): bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di na mi 'jog pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di
309b7('bum): lha ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di na so so yang dag par rig pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
310a1('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni byams pa chen po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'dir//
310a2('bum): snying rje chen po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bsgom pa rnam
310a3('bum): par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bslob pa 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom
310a4('bum): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
310a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
310a6('bum): bsgom pa 'di na/ dgra bcom pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rang byang chub bsgom pa rnam par
310a7('bum): bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di
310b1('bum): shes ra bya pha rol tu sbyin pa bcom pa 'di ni/ rnam pa thams cad mabyed pa nyid bathom pa rnam par 'asgom pa'o// bcom par 'das kyi bka' stsal ba/
310b2('bum): rab 'byor dade bzhin no// de bzhin te/ rab 'byor 'angs ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bathob pa 'di ni/ bsgrubs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor
310b3('bum): 'di lnga ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di sa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
310b4('bum): 'di ni 'du shes bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'du byed bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//
310b5('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'i tshe rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lnga te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
310b6('bum): ba bsgom pa 'di ni/ mig bsgom pa rnam par bsdom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lnga ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnga ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
310b7('bum): ba'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sna bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
311a1('bum): phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lce bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni lus bsgom
311a2('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ yid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste
311a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni gzug bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di pa ni sda bsgom/
311a4('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di na dri bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lnga sde shes
311a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di na/ ro bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lnga ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ reg pa bsgom
311a6('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ chos bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes
311a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mig gi rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lnga sa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'ang
311b1('bum): ni ra ba'i rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di sa ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bcom pa 'din sna'i rnam par shes pa bco
311b2('bum): brnab par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'dus shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni lce'i rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//
311b3('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bathob pa 'don lus kyi rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bcom pa'o// rab 'byor 'ad lta te shes
311b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di na yid kyi rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rolatu sbyin pa bathom pa
311b5('bum): 'di ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg
311b6('bum): pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//
311b7('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
312a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
312a2('bum): pa bsgom pa 'di na/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mig gi 'dus
312a3('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di na rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i
312a4('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
312a5('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di na lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam
312a6('bum): par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bcom
312a7('bum): pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa
312b1('bum): rab 'byor 'do sa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sa'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
312b2('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni/ chu'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta 9/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ me'i khams bsgom pa rnam par
312b3('bum): bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thom pa 'drin/ rlung gi khams bathom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta
312b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bcom pa 'din nam mkha'i khams bslob pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rolatu phyin pa bsgom pa
312b5('bum): 'di ni/ rnam par shes pa'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bcom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di sa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ ma rig pa bcom pa
312b6('bum): rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'du byed bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'a di lta ste/ shes
312b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di na/ rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'ang ni/
313a1('bum): ming dang gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di niskye mched drug bsgom pa rnam par
313a2('bum): bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
313a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sred pa bsgom
313a4('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'dri lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ len pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste
313a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ srid pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di na
313a6('bum): skye ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rga shi bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byos
313a7('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni bdag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
313b1('bum): pa 'di ni/ sems can bsngom pa rnam par bcom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bcom pa 'di ni/ srog bsgom pa rnam par bathom pa'o//
313b2('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'gro ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
313b3('bum): phyin pa bsgom pa 'di na/ gso ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ skyes bu bsgom pa rnam par
313b4('bum): bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'do ni/ gang zag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab
313b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ shed can bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di wA ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ shed bdag
313b6('bum): bsgob pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta sge ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni de byed pa po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor
313b7('bum): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ tshor ba po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa na
314a1('bum): shes pa po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lnga ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni ni mthong ba po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
314a2('bum): pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta te/ shes rab
314a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni gi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
314a4('bum): 'di ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta skye ga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
314a5('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta steg shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par
314a6('bum): bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor
314a7('bum): 'di sa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyiran pa
314b1('bum): bcom pa 'di ni/ phyi thong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bathom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di la ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'ang ni/ byi rang stong pa nyid bcom pa rnam
314b2('bum): par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bcom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta/
314b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ chen po stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgob pa 'di ni
314b4('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phrin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa rna pa
314b5('bum): bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'dri ni/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta/
314b6('bum): ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta skyeg shes rab kyi pha rol tu
314b7('bum): phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni// thog ma dang tha ma med pa bstong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta steg shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'an
315a1('bum): dor ba med pa thong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid/
315a2('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab
315a3('bum): 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
315a4('bum): pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ dngos po med pa stong
315a5('bum): pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//
315a6('bum): rab 'byor 'di lnga ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir pa bsgom pa 'di ro// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste
315a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'do ni ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir pa bsgom
315b1('bum): pa 'di ni/ yang dag par spong ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom ba'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rdzu' phrul gyi rkang pa bsgom
315b2('bum): pa rnam par bsngob pa'o// rab 'byor 'di wA k+She/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ dbang po bsdom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di sa ste/
315b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ stobs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lnga steshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir pa bsgon
315b4('bum): pa 'di ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'phags
315b5('bum): ba'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'phags
315b6('bum): pa'i bden pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta sde/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa bsgom pa 'di nI bas ma ga tan
315b7('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa bsgom pa 'a ri no/
316a1('bum): tshad med pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di na/ gzugs
316a2('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta skye/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa bsgom pa rnam par
316a3('bum): bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//
316a4('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin+da pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bsgom pa rnam par
316a5('bum): bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mngon par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste
316a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'du na// ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lnga ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'don/
316a7('bum): gzungs kyi sgo bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bsgom pa rnam
316b1('bum): bar bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni// mi 'jigs pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/
316b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ so so yang dag par rog pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'd-i lta / shes rab kyi pha ro
316b3('bum): byir ba bsgom pa 'di ni/ byams pa chen po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lnga ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ snying
316b4('bum): chen po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bsgom
316b5('bum): ba rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//
316b6('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lan cig phyir 'or ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lnga ste/ shes ra
316b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
317a1('bum): 'di ni/ dgra bcom pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rang byang chub
317a2('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//
317a3('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// de nas yang bcom
317a4('bum): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
317a5('bum): tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mngon par chags pa med ram zhes rab 'byor shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
317a6('bum): po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags pa med ram zhes/
317a7('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
317b1('bum): chen po brtson 'bras kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs
317b2('bum): brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags pa mar ram zhes/ bzod pa'i pha rol/
317b3('bum): tu byor ba la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khribs
317b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags pa mer ram zhes// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag
317b5('bum): blar bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon pa chags pa med ram zhes/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
317b6('bum): byin pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag por bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang stong pa nyid
317b7('bum): la mngon par chags pa mer ram zhes/ nang stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems
318a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po byi stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ phyi stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
318a2('bum): yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyi nung stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med du ma zhes/ phyi nang stong pa nyid
318a3('bum): kha byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
318a4('bum): la mngon par chags pa med dang zhes stong pa cir stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor
318a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chen po stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ chen po stong pa nyi la byang chub sems dpa' sems
318a6('bum): dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'u sems dpa' chen po don dam pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med
318a7('bum): ram zhes don dam pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
318b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po 'dus byas stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rjen
318b2('bum): po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dusu ma byas stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes
318b3('bum): 'dusu ma byas stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
318b4('bum): chen po mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
318b5('bum): cher po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa
318b6('bum): med dam zhes ka thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems
318b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med ram zhes/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
319a1('bum): chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang bzhin stong pa nyid la mngon par chags
319a2('bum): pa med dam zhes/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
319a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
319a4('bum): chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med
319a5('bum): dam zhes/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems
319a6('bum): drapa' sems dpa'u chen po mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa mer dam zhes/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa'
319a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dngos po mer pa stong pa nyid la mngon par
319b1('bum): chags pa med dam zhes/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chu
319b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ ngo bo nyid spyong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
319b3('bum): chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par
319b4('bum): chags pa med ram zhes/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor
319b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la byang
319b6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dgu par spong ba rnams la
319b7('bum): mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor bya ba
320a1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes ka rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la byang chub sems
320a2('bum): dba' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang po rnams pa mngon par chags pa med
320a3('bum): nam zhes/ dbang po rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
320a4('bum): chen po stobs rnams la mngon par chags pa med dram zhes/ stobs rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o//
320a5('bum): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la
320a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i kham
320a7('bum): yan las brgyad pa la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yos
320b1('bum): su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po babacas pa'i bden pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med rab zhes/
320b2('bum): phags pa'i bden pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
320b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan rnams la mngon par chagasu pa med dam zhes/ bsam gtan rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs
320b4('bum): su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ tshad med pa
320b5('bum): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs med
320b6('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems
320b7('bum): dba' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par thar pa rnams la mngon par chags med dam zhe/
321a1('bum): rnam par thar pa rna mus la byang chub sems dpa' semus dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa
321a2('bum): sems dpa' chen po mthar gyis gnas pa'i spyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
321a3('bum): kha byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong
321a4('bum): pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smor ba med pa la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ rnam par thar pa'i the stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smor pa med pa la byang chub
321a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa rnams la mngon par chags pa
321a6('bum): mer ram zhes/ mngon par shes pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting
321a7('bum): nge 'dzi rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub
321b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzangs kyi sgo rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ gzangs kyi sgo rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su
321b2('bum): brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'o stobs rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ de bzhin gsheg
321b3('bum): pa'i stobs rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'jigs pa
321b4('bum): rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ mi 'jigs pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub ma
321b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
321b6('bum): chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa chen po la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ byams pa chen po la byang chub
321b7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po la mngon par chags pa med dang zhes/ snying rje
322a1('bum): chen po la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sem dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
322a2('bum): 'dres pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o//
322a3('bum): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad shes pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ thams cad shes pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems
322a4('bum): chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la mngor bar chags pa med dam zhes/ lam gyi rnam
322a5('bum): pa shes pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
322a6('bum): nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// /
322a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po nyes brgya nyer lnga pa// phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher po de shes rab
322b1('bum): bkro tu thon pa za' yo dri la sbyor ba'i tshe/ pha rom gyis smras pa dang / pha rol gyis bsgyur pa la byid por mi lnga 'am/ byor mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
322b2('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab po 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ pha rol gyi dad pas mi 'gro 'am/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher po de shes rab kyi pha rol
322b3('bum): byin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems bskyed pas 'phrogs pa pa yin nam/ zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems bskyed pas 'phrogs pa ma yin napa/
322b4('bum): ting phrag dang bcas pa'o sems bskyed pas 'phrogs pa la yir nam/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir ba zab mo da
322b5('bum): baspyod pa'i tshe/ thon pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur nyam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tar/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyir pa dang bral
322b6('bum): ma gyur ta ma/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tA ma/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ shes rab kyi tu phyin pa dang bral
322b7('bum): bar ma gyur tam/ zhes yongs su brtag par bya ste/ gal te phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir pa zab mo 'di rnam pa/
323a1('bum): mi 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur la/ zhum pa dang yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur zhing // de'i yid phyir nur bar mi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/
323a2('bum): zab mo 'di thos par dga' la/ thos nas kyang 'dzin cing 'tshang la/ klog cing kun chub par byed de/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed la/ de bzhin nyid du nan tan du byed na/ rab 'byor byang chub
323a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ni/ sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yongs su dris shing yongs su brtag par byas pa dang / gzung zhing bcangs te/
323a4('bum): kur chub par byas pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byas par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes
323a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'chad pa'i tshe/ mi 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur la// zhum par mi 'gyur/ yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur zhing / ra'i yid kyi phyir mi
323a6('bum): ldog la/ thos nas kyang yongs su 'dzin cing 'chang la// thog cing kun chub par byed de/ tshul bzhin du ying la byed pa'i phyir ro/ sog/ com ldan 'das byang chub sems rapa' sems dpa' chen po gang
323a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ mi 'jigs mi sdang theg par mi 'gyur zhing / zhum par mi 'gyur/ yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur na/ bcom ldan
323b1('bum): 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ji ltar brtag par biH/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor bya
323b2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di brtag par bya'o//
323b3('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyer ba nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
323b4('bum): ba zab mo 'di rtog pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor stong pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
323b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin// rab 'byor mtshan ma med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
323b6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor smon pa med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
323b7('bum): zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor nam mkha' la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog
324a1('bum): pa yin/ rab 'byor skye ba med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa
324a2('bum): yin// rab 'byor 'gag pa med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor kun
324a3('bum): nas nyon mongs pa med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor rnam
324a4('bum): par byang ba med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor de bzhin nyid la
324a5('bum): gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsam pas//
324a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin// rab 'byor yang dag pa'i mtha' la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems
324a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin// rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
324b1('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin// rab 'byor bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
324b2('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinu pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin// rab 'byor mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam mas byang chub sems dpa' semus drapa' chen po
324b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor rmi lam la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab tu
324b4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor gzugs brnyan la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
324b5('bum): pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor sgra brnyan la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
324b6('bum): pa rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor smrig rgyu la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/
324b7('bum): rab 'byor sgyu ma la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor sprul pa la
325a1('bum): gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin no//
325a2('bum): gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das de ltar stong pa nyid pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la
325a3('bum): rtog par 'gyur/ mtshan ma med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/
325a4('bum): smon pa med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ nam mkha' la gzhol ba'i
325a5('bum): bsam pasabyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ skye ba ma mchis pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas
325a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ 'gag pa ma mchis pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dang
325a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa la gzhol ba'i
325b1('bum): bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ de bzhin nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ kyang /
325b2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ chos kyi dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa
325b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpar sems dpa'
325b4('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ mnyam pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
325b5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
325b6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa la gzhol bu'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
325b7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ rmi lam la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
326a1('bum): la rtog par 'gyur/ gzugs brnyan la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
326a2('bum): 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ sgra brnyan la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ smig
326a3('bum): rgyu la gzhol ba'i bsam pasabyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ sgyu ma la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang
326a4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur// sprul pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
326a5('bum): dbang chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs la rtog pa lags sam
326a6('bum): tsher ba la rtog pa lags sam/ 'du shes la rtog pa lags sam 'a du byed la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sar/ mig la rtog pa lags sa
326a7('bum): rna ba la rtog pa lags sam/ sna la rtog pa lags sam/ lce la rtog pa lags sam ka lus la rtog pa lags sam/ yid la rtog pa lags sam/ gzugs la rtog
326b1('bum): ba lags sam/ sgra la rtog pa lags sam/ dri la rtog pa lags sam/ rol tog pa lags sam/ reg la rtog pa lags sam/ chos la rtog pa lags sam
326b2('bum): mig gi rnam par shes pa la rtog par lags sam/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ snga'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sa ma?/ lce'i rnam pa
326b3('bum): par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ sras kyi rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ mig gi 'dus te reg
326b4('bum): pa la rtog pa lags sama?/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sama?/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags
326b5('bum): sam/ lus kyi'adus te reg pa la rtog pa lugs sama?/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa
326b6('bum): lags sam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ lce'i rdus
326b7('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
327a1('bum): tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ sa'i khams la rtog pa lags sam/ chu'i khams la rtog pa lags sam/ me'i khrims la rtog pa lags sam/
327a2('bum): rlung gi khams la rtog pa lags sam nam mkha'i khams la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams la rtog pa lags sam nA ma rig pa la rtog pa lags sam/
327a3('bum): 'du byed la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ ming dang gzugs la rtog pa lags sam/ skye mched drug la rtog pa lags sam/ reg pa la rtog
327a4('bum): ba lags sam/ tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ sred pa la rtog pa lags sam/ len pa la rtog pa lags sam/ srid pa la rtog pa lags sam/ skye ba la rtog pa
327a5('bum): lags sam/ h+la shi la rtog pa lags sam/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa lugs samatshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa lags sam/ bzod
327a6('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa lags sa ra/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa lags samabasam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa la gus sam/
327a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa lags samanang stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ phyi stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags samaphyi nang stong pa
327b1('bum): nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sum/ chen po stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam
327b2('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags bsam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid pa rtog pa lags sam
327b3('bum): thob ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ ror ba meng ba stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam
327b4('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ rang gi mtshan nyid sbyong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam
327b5('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/
327b6('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la rtog pa lags bsam
327b7('bum): dbang po rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ stobs rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la rtog pa lags samaka' phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
328a1('bum): pa la rtog pa lags sam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la rtog pa lags samabasam gtan rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ tshad med pa rnams
328a2('bum): la rtog pa lags sam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
328a3('bum): par 'jug pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ rnams par mthar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la rtog pa lags sam// mngon par shes pa rnams la
328a4('bum): rtog pa lags sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la rtog pa lags
328a5('bum): bsam ka mi 'jigs pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ byams pa chen po la rtog pa lags sam/ snyir

328b1('bum): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ gzugs la rtog pa ma yin no// tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no// 'du shes la rtog pa ma yin no// 'du byed la
328b2('bum): rtog pa ma yin no// rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no// mig la rtog pa ma yin no// rna ba la rtog pa ma yin no// snal rtog pa ma yin no// lce la rtog pa ma yin no//

329b1('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa ma yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa ma yin no// nang stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// byi stong pa nyid pa
329b2('bum): rtog pa ma yin no// byin stong pa nyid du la rtog pa ma yin no// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// chen po stong pa nyid la rdog pa ma yin no//
329b3('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// 'dus byas stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// 'dus ma byas sbyong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// mtha' las 'as
329b4('bum): ba skyong pa cad la rtog pa ma yin no// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// rang bzhin thong
329b5('bum): pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// chos thams cad stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// rang gi mtshan ljid stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// mi dmigs pa stong pa ni
329b6('bum): la rtog pa ma yin no// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid la rtog

330b2('bum): nan pa yi bdun/ sus kyad+ha ma byas/ rnam par ma byas/ gdu byas kyang sna 'ongs/ gung du yang ma song / phyogs na yang mi smanas sprul na s+yAng mI stanAs/ gdun srung/
330b3('bum): mi gnas pa ste/ de la grangs mi dmigs so// 'gro ba dang 'od pa yang mi dmigs so// gang la grangs mi dmigs shing 'gro ba dadu 'ong ba mi dmigs pa de ni/

331a1('bum): bya/ par shes pas ma yin no// mig gi 'dus te reg pas ma yin no// rna ba'i 'dus tre reg pas ma yin no// sna'i 'dus te reg pas ma yin no//
