333a5('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// mig gi'adus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshe rab nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
333a6('bum): gyis tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// lce'i 'dus
333a7('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// lus kyi 'arus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//
333b1('bum): ming kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// sa'i khams cid kyang rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid do// chu'i khams nyid kyang rnam
333b2('bum): b+ha thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// me'i khams cid kyang rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid do// rlung gi khams cid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rnam pa pa'i khams
333b3('bum): nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// ma rig pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
333b4('bum): ro// 'du byed nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// ming drang gzugs nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad
333b5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid do// skye mched drug nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// reg pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa bam
333b6('bum): cang mkhyen pa nyid do// srad pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// len pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// srid pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams
333b7('bum): cang mkhyen pa nyid do// skye ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rga shi nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid
334a1('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// bzod pa'i pha
334a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// brtsor 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
334a3('bum): phyin pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// narang stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams
334a4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid do// phyi stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam
334a5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// chen po stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// 'dus
334a6('bum): byas stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang
334a7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ro// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams ca
334b1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rang gi
334b2('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang
334b3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ro// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
334b4('bum): nyid do// dran pa nye bar gnag pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rdzu 'bral gyi rku
334b5('bum): pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// dbang po nyid kyang rnam pa thams car mkhyen pa nyid do// stobs nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mi byed pa nyid do//
334b6('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ro// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// 'phags
334b7('bum): pa'i bden pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ro// bsam gtan nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// tshad med pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad
335a1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rnam par thar pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams
335a2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyidra dang / mtshan ma med
335a3('bum): pa dang / smon pa med pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// mngon par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang rnam pa thar
335a4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid do// gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// mi
335a5('bum): 'jigs pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// byams pa chen po nyid kyang rnam pa
335a6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// snying rje chen po cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang rnam pa tham sA cang mkhyen pa nyid
335a7('bum): ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni'i di ltar gzugs kyi de bzhin cing gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams car mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin/
335b1('bum): ba de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin cing gcig pa'o//
335b2('bum): 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin cing gcig pa'o// 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang
335b3('bum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni// de bzhin cid gcig pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thar
335b4('bum): cang mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// mig gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
335b5('bum): yon pa da / de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rna ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/
335b6('bum): sna'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin cing gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// lce'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam
335b7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// lus kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi re
336a1('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// yid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gung
336a2('bum): yin pa das de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//
336a3('bum): bla'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rI'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams
336a4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// ro'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni//
336a5('bum): de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// reg gi de bzhin cing grang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin+da pa rA ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// chos kyi
336a6('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// mig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin
336a7('bum): pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin cid gcig pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams
336b1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin cid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de
336b2('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de
336b3('bum): ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyi du gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin ni
336b4('bum): gcig pa'o// yod kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// mig
336b5('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid glang yin pa de ni// de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhizhin/
336b6('bum): gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thas
336b7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa re ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi re bzhin
337a1('bum): nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin de/
337a2('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de/
337a3('bum): nI/ de bzhin nI gcig pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
337a4('bum): yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin /
337a5('bum): gang sim pa dri bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa ni/
337a6('bum): de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de ba'i
337a7('bum): nyid gcig pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin ni
337b1('bum): bci bya pa'o// mid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin ci gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gci
337b2('bum): pa'o// sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// chu'i khams kyi de bzhin
337b3('bum): gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams
337b4('bum): snang mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin
337b5('bum): nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin da/
337b6('bum): gcig pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// ma
337b7('bum): rig pa'i de bzhin cid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// 'du byed kyi de bzhin cing gang yin pa dang /
338a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa
338a2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de
338a3('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni//
338a4('bum): de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//
338a5('bum): tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// sred pa'i ride bzhin nyid gang yin
338a6('bum): ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa re ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// len pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
338a7('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// srid pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
338b1('bum): pa de ni/ de bzhin rjid gcig pa'o// skye ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid glang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//
338b2('bum): rga shi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gung yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
338b3('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
338b4('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dre ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin
338b5('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyir bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dri bzhin
338b6('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhi
338b7('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin
339a1('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
339a2('bum): gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams
339a3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de
339a4('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid grang yin
339a5('bum): ba de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad ma byed pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig
339a6('bum): pa'o// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi dri bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// 'dus byas
339a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de
339b1('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// mtha' lus 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid bang
339b2('bum): min pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mAkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid glang yin pa d+ha ni/ dri bzhin nyid gcis pa'o// thog ma dang tha ma med pa sto d+ha pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
339b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid grang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
339b4('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin cing gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni// de
339b5('bum): bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhir nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//
339b6('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyer pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi
339b7('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin cing gcig pa'o// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
340a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa tham
340a2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
340a3('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa/
340a4('bum): de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig
340a5('bum): bya'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// dbang po rnams
340a6('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid bar yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang
340a7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams
340b1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyi
340b2('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni// de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
340b3('bum): bde ni/ de bzhin cing gcig pa'o// bsam gtan rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nying gcig
340b4('bum): pa'o// tshad med pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyi dag nga yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// gzugs med pa'i
340b5('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin cing gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rnam par thar pa
340b6('bum): rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ri/ de bzhin cing gcig pa'o// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
340b7('bum): ba dgu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
341a1('bum): mtsharan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin
341a2('bum): gcig pa'o// mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa rnams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//
341a3('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi de bzhin cid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin ni yang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid
341a4('bum): gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa
341a5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
341a6('bum): gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ga 'ayin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid
341a7('bum): gcig pa'o// byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin cing gcig pa'o// snying rje chen po'i de bzhin
341b1('bum): cing gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa cid kyi de bzhin nyid pang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos pa 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin cing gang yin pa dang /
341b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin cing gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin cing gcig pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u sum cu brgyad do//
341b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po nyis brgya nyer drug pa// / de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams
341b4('bum): lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi me tog ut+pal dang / pad+mo dang / ku mu da dang / pun ra ri ka mang po khyer te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na bde logs su 'thor bar gyur to//
341b5('bum): gtor nas bcom ldan 'das ga ngan pa der dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// 'khod nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs
341b6('bum): yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
341b7('bum): rgyas rnams/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di las 'di skad du/ gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs so//
342a1('bum): tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o// 'du shes nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
342a2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du shes so// 'du byed nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
342a3('bum): pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// mig nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig go// rna ba nyid rnam pa thams
342a4('bum): cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'o// sna nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang b+ha'o// lce nyid rnam pa thams cad
342a5('bum): mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lha'o// lus nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus so// yid nyid rnam pa thams cad
342a6('bum): mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid do// gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs so// sgra nyid rnam
342a7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang smra'o// dri nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dri'o// ro nyid rnam pa
342b1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ro'o// reg nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang reg go// chos cing rnam pa tham
342b2('bum): cad mkhyen pa cing ste// rnam pa thams ma mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos so// mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam par
342b3('bum): shes pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa cid rnam pa
342b4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'i/
342b5('bum): kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o// yid kyi
342b6('bum): rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad
342b7('bum): mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o// rna ba'i 'angadus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
343a1('bum): nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg
343a2('bum): pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams
343a3('bum): cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
343a4('bum): nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg
343a5('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i
343a6('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis cho
343a7('bum): ba'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// lus kyi 'dus
343b1('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyer pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad ma byed pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
343b2('bum): gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// sa'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad
343b3('bum): mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sa'i khams so// chu'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chu'i khams
343b4('bum): so// me'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang me'i khams so// rlung gi khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa tham
343b5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rlung gi khams so// ram mkha'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so// rnam
343b6('bum): par shes pa'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so// ma rig pa nyid rnam thams cad mkhyen pa
343b7('bum): ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ma rig pa'o// 'du byed cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang du byed do// rnam par shes
344a1('bum): pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// ming dang gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
344a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ming dang gzugs so// skye mched drug nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye mched drug go/
344a3('bum): reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang reg pa'o// tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshor
344a4('bum): pa'o// sred pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sred pa'o// len pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
344a5('bum): nyid kyang len pa'o// srid pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang srid pa'o// skye ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams
344a6('bum): cang mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba'o// rga shi nyid rnam thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rga shi'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
344a7('bum): pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
344b1('bum): nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
344b2('bum): parjo/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol
344b3('bum): tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad 'khyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams
344b4('bum): cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nang stong pa cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa cid
344b5('bum): kya nang stong pa nyid do// byi stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa skye/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do// phyi rang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad
344b6('bum): mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang phyin pa stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang
344b7('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// chen po stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do// don dam stong pa nyid rnam pa
345a1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyer pa ste/ rnam pa
345a2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong
345a3('bum): pa nyid do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do// thog ma dang
345a4('bum): tha ma med pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thog ma da tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do// dor ba med pa stong pa cing rnam
345a5('bum): thams par ma khyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cung sa khyen pa nyid kyang dor pa med pa stong banyid do// rang bzhin myong ba cid rnam pa tham pa cang mkhyen pa ste/ rnas pa bam
345a6('bum): TA ma ther bya nyid yang rung ba'i stong bcir ro// tshos mams cad stong ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa y-i/ rnam pa thams cad brkyen ba cing sa chesu thams
345a7('bum): ba bcing ngo // rang gi mtsha ci cho sa cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa / rnam pa thams cad ma la ngo// mi
345b1('bum): stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do// dngos po med pa slong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste
345b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ngos
345b3('bum): nyid stong pa nyid do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
345b4('bum): nying // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang drar pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so// yang dag par spong ba
345b5('bum): nyid rnam pa tha mar mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid rnam thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa
345b6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so// dbang po nyid rnams pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dbang po rnams so//
345b7('bum): stobapa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang stobs rnams so// byang chub kyi yan lag nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyer pa ste/ rnam pa
346a1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
346a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'a pags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid rnam thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
346a3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so// bsam gtan nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsam gtan rnam
346a4('bum): so// tshad med pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshad med pa rnams so// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid
346a5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// rnam par thar pa nyid rnam pa thams cad
346a6('bum): mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams so// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
346a7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa
346b1('bum): nyid rnam pa thams par mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyer pa nyid kyang dam par bar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / satshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o// mngon par
346b2('bum): ba cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ni kyang mngon par shes pa nams so// ting pe 'dzin cing rnam pa thams cad sa khyer pa ste/ rnam du
346b3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams so// gzungs kyi sgo nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyer ba ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sri rnams so//
346b4('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so// mi 'jigs pa
346b5('bum): nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa rnams so// so so yang dag par rig pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
346b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so// byams pa chen po nyi de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'di
346b7('bum): kyang byams pa chen po'o// snying rje chen po cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
347a1('bum): 'dres pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so//
347a2('bum): gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med
347a3('bum): do// tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su
347a4('bum): byar med do// 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin ci gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing
347a5('bum): gnyis su byar med do// 'du byed kyi de bzhin cing gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ ga
347a6('bum): su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rnam pa thams ca mkhyen pa nyid kyi ro bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su
347a7('bum): byar med do// rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig ste/
347b1('bum): gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// mig gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin ning gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin ning gcig
347b2('bum): pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rna ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin ning gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin
347b3('bum): nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// sna'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gung yin pa de ni/
347b4('bum): de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// lce'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
347b5('bum): yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// lus kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
347b6('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su mad cing gnyis su byar med do// yid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
347b7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
348a1('bum): rnamA thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// sgra'i de bzhin nyid
348a2('bum): gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// dri'i de bzhin cing gang
348a3('bum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// ro'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
348a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// reg gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam
348a5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// chos kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams
348a6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin cing gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// mig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang
348a7('bum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rna ba'i rnam par shes
348b1('bum): ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid glang yin pa ra ni/ de bzhin cing gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//
348b2('bum): rtswa'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin cing gang yin pa dang/ nam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin cir gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin cing gcig pa ste/ gnyis sgyu med cing ba rnaMs
348b3('bum): su bar med do// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin ci dgra bayin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste gnyis
348b4('bum): su mar cing gnyis su byar med do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyer pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid
348b5('bum): gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
348b6('bum): yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su med do// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
348b7('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin cing gang yin pa dang / rnam pa/
349a1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i
349a2('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// kye'i
349a3('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar
349a4('bum): med do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med
349a5('bum): cing gnyis su byar med do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa
349a6('bum): sde/ gnyis su mad cing gnyis su byar med do// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin
349a7('bum): nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
349b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad 'khyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin cing gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin cing gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su b+har med do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin
349b2('bum): nying gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// lce'i 'dus te
349b3('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa drang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med
349b4('bum): cing gnyis su byar med do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
349b5('bum): de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// yid kyi 'u rus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
349b6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin cing gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa
349b7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang
350a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gung yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// me'i khams
350a2('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//
350a3('bum): rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin cing gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ska/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su

355a7('bum): mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin cing gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin cing gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis
355b1('bum): su bA med do// dgra bcom pa cid kyi de bzhin cing gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin cing gcig pa ste/ gnyis su
355b2('bum): med cing gnyis su byar med do// rang byang chub kyi de bzhin cing gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin cing gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin cid gcig pa ste/

355b4('bum): de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su sngar med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin cing gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa cid
355b5('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rgyun du zhugs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa
355b6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyingad gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i de bzhin nyid
355b7('bum): gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin cing gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// phyir
356a1('bum): mi 'ong ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dri bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyi drug cig bste/ gnyis su med cing
356a2('bum): gnyis su byar med do// dgra bcom pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni / de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis
356a3('bum): su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rang sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni
356a4('bum): bzhin ni gcig pa sa/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// byang chub sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
356a5('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa du na/ de bzhin nyid gcigri ba gnyis su medu cing gnyis su byur med do// sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid grang yin pa dang // rnam pa
356a6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar meng do zhes sngon bu ni/ de na ste
356a7('bum): bzhinag shegs pa rnams kyi byang chub shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zab cing bas dka' la khang du chung bar dga' 'ong / brtag tu ma mchis la/ chog pa'i slong sum
356b1('bum): ma lags pa ste/ ni zhing zab zhib mo mkhas shing rtogs pas rig par bgyi ba skye'ajig rten thams cad kyis yid ches par dka' ba'o//
356b2('bum): nas bcom ldan 'das kyi/ 'dod pa ra spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i sna'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces bka stsal to// sgyu'i bu dag de de bzhin no//
356b3('bum): bzhin to/ lde'i bu dag gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs so// tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa skye/
356b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad bakhyen pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o// 'du shes nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du shes so// 'du byed nyid
356b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
356b6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// mig nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig go// rna ba nyid rnam pa thams cad
356b7('bum): mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'o// sna nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'o// lce nyid rnam pa
357a1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa ste// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'o// lus nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
357a2('bum): pa nyid kyang lus so// yid nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid do// gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
357a3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs so// sgra nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang smra'o// dri nyid rnam pa thams cad
357a4('bum): mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dri'o// ro nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ro'o// reg nyid rnam pa thams cad
357a5('bum): mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang reg go// chos nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos so// mig gi rnam par
357a6('bum): shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
357a7('bum): ste rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang
357b1('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lde'i rnam par shes pa'o// lus kyi ma
357b2('bum): par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams
357b3('bum): cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
357b4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o//
357b5('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad
357b6('bum): mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams
357b7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus
358a1('bum): te reg pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus
358a2('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i
358a3('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
358a4('bum): tshor ba'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// /
358a5('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba'o//
358a6('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// sa'i
358a7('bum): khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sa'i khams so// chu'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa
358b1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid byang chu'i khams so// me'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mthun pa ste rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang me'i khams so//
358b2('bum): rlung gi 'amus nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rlung gi khams so// nam mkha'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad
358b3('bum): mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so// rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa
358b4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so// ma rig pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ma rig pa'o// 'du
358b5('bum): byed nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa se/ rnam pa thams
358b6('bum): cang mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// ming dang gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ming dang gzugs so//
358b7('bum): skye mched drug nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye mched drug go// reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams
359a1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang reg pa'o// tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o// sred pa
359a2('bum): nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sred pa'o// len pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
359a3('bum): nyid kyang len pa'o// sred pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang srid pa'o// skye ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa
359a4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba'o// rga shi nying rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rga shi'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa tham
359a5('bum): cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
359a6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
359a7('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa
359b1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam bya bams
359b2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do// byi stong pa
359b3('bum): nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa skye/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do// phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
359b4('bum): kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// chen po stong pa nyid rnam
359b5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do// don ngas pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa se/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
359b6('bum): nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do// 'dus ma
359b7('bum): byas stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
360a1('bum): ba ste rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
360a2('bum): sngo Ta rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa se rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
360a3('bum): ba nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// chos thams
360a4('bum): cad stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
360a5('bum): ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mi dmig
360a6('bum): pa stong pa nyid do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams
360a7('bum): cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
360b1('bum): kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so//
360b2('bum): yang dag par spong ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
360b3('bum): ste rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so// dbang po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dbang po rnams so//
360b4('bum): stobs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang stobs rnams so// byang chub kyi yan lag nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam
360b5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
360b6('bum): kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
360b7('bum): so/ bsam gtan nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so// tshad med pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
361a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshad med pa rnams so// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams
361a2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// rnam par thar pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam
361a3('bum): par thar pa rnams so// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
361a4('bum): par 'jug pa rnams so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
361a5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'o// mngon par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste
361a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so// ting nge 'dzin nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ting
361a7('bum): 'dzin rnams so// gzungs kyi sgo nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sdos
361b1('bum): nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so// mi 'jigs pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
361b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa rnams so// so so yang dag par rig pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang so so
361b3('bum): yang dag par rig pa rnams so// byams pa chen po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang byams pa chen po'o// snying rje chen po nyid rnam
361b4('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
361b5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rgyun du zhugs
361b6('bum): pa'i 'bras bu'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// khyer mi 'ong ba'i 'gra
361b7('bum): bu yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// dgra bcom pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
362a1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang dgra bcom pa nyid do// rang byang chub kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rang byang chub bo// lam gyi rnam pa
362a2('bum): shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa'o// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid kyang rnam pa
362a3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
362a4('bum): stong phrag brgya pa bam po nyis brgya nyer bdun pa// gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni
362a5('bum): bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni
362a6('bum): de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
362a7('bum): pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
362b1('bum): banyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig paste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin rnyi gang
362b2('bum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byur med do// mig pa de
362b3('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rna
362b4('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pu ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byor med do//
362b5('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med // lce'i
362b6('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// lus kyi
362b7('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni// de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// yid
363a1('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med
363a2('bum): cing gnyis su byar med do// gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni// de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med
363a3('bum): cing gnyis su byar med do// sgra'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su ma
363a4('bum): gnyis su byar med do// dri'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste gnyis su med cing
363a5('bum): gnyis su byar med do// ro de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing
363a6('bum): gnyis su byar med do// reg gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing
363a7('bum): gnyis su byar med do// chos kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med
363b1('bum): cing gnyis su byang med do// mig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig
363b2('bum): bu ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byur med do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/
363b3('bum): de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
363b4('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su meng cing gnyis su byar med do// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang klu rnam pa
363b5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid
363b6('bum): grang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// yid kyi rnam par
363b7('bum): shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su
364a1('bum): kya/ byar med do// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig
364a2('bum): pa ste gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang

364a6('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med/
